greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is odd; otherwise, a(n) = 2^k - 1 where 2^k is the largest power of 2 that divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2^e - 1 if e > 0, a(p^e) = 1 if p > 2.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, May 21 2008
